metadata.title: Foster Youth By PUMA
metadata.description: This CSV file contains estimates of foster youth under the age of 21 in Public Use Microdata Areas (PUMAs) for 50 states + DC in the United States. It includes data on the count of foster youth, the foster youth per population, and the foster youth density.
metadata.author: Zofia Stanley

columns.name: PUMA
columns.description: Public Use Microdata Area ID (unique within each state)

columns.name: count
columns.description: Estimate of foster youth under the age of 21 in the PUMA

columns.name: foster_per_pop
columns.description: Estimate of foster youth per 1,000 residents under the age of 21 in the PUMA

columns.name: foster_density
columns.description: Estimate of foster youth per sq. km. in the PUMA
